title: Believe: Book One: The Tales of The Realm
description: Lily Marens has always loved fairy tales and fantasy, but even she can't believe it when she encounters a mermaid stranded on the beach. Stranger still, she is told that she may be the only one who can save the magical land known as The Realm. The corruption of technology has leaked across the barriers, causing the magical world to suffer and fade. Lily decides to accompany the mermaid and undertake a quest to recover a seed from the Tree of Belief. It is a journey that will change her life forever.
author: Erin K. Germain
